title.rendered: About Rosemary at Final Touch Studios

content.rendered:
About Final Touch Studios

Rosemary Clyde

Final Touch Studios is a Kansas City wedding floral design studio. Owned and operated by Rosemary Clyde.

Hi! I am Rosemary. I want you to know I bring over 30 years of experience in the floral and design industry to your Kansas City wedding or special occasion.

In 1994, I created Final Touch Studios to provide the highest quality fresh flowers for weddings and special events. I am now creating awesome displays of flowers for about 65 weddings a year. Although I have help setting up and servicing each wedding or event, I personally design and prepare every arrangement and bouquet. You can be sure that you get what you order. I am committed to making your special day – just that – as special as it could possibly be.

Please take the time to browse the small sampling of my work shown in the inspiration gallery. Then, if you desire, you are invited to make an appointment to meet with me and view any of the hundreds of photographs of my work collected over the years.

I hope to see you soon.

Rosemary, Thank you so much for making Michelle and Adams wedding day so special. After we met with you, we felt so comfortable in the fact that you would take great care of us. What I want you to know is that the flowers far exceeded my expectations – they were exquisite! You took the flowers Michelle wanted and made each piece so special. For that, we are sincerely grateful. May God continue to Bless you and your talent and business. With love and appreciation,

Kelly W., Mother of the Brid
